user_query: I want to surprise my partner with a romantic dinner at home. Can you suggest some romantic and easy-to-make recipes for the main course? It would be helpful if you could provide me with the ingredients and preparation instructions for these recipes. Additionally, could you recommend some cheeses that would complement these romantic dishes?

TaskList.description: Gather a list of romantic and easy-to-make main course recipes.
Retrieve the detailed ingredients and preparation instructions for the selected recipes.
Research and compile a list of cheeses that would complement the selected romantic dishes.
